full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement
### Title
Carbon/Hydrogen/Nitrogen Elemental (CHN) Analyzer for the National Laboratory for Environmental Testing - Saskatoon (NLET-S)

### Reference Number
cb-776-84078257

### Amendment Number
3

### Tender Closing Date & Time
11 March 2024, at 3:00 PM (UTC-7)

### Status
Expired Tender

### Solicitation Number
5000075333

### Publication Date
13 February 2024

### Expected Contract Start Date
31 March 2024

### Expected Contract End Date
31 March 2024

### Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category**: Goods & Services
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

### Contracting Entity
- **Name**: Environment and Climate Change Canada
- **Address**: 351, boul. Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H3, Canada

### Contact Information
- **Name**: Mitchell Palmer
- **Email**: [mitchell.palmer@ec.gc.ca](mailto:mitchell.palmer@ec.gc.ca)
- **Phone**: +1 613-854-7053

### Tender Notice Documents
Available at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31861/5000075333_npp.pdf

### Procurement Planning
- **Procurement Category**: Goods
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: None

### Estimated Contract Value
This information is not disclosed at this time.

### Goods/Services Description
Carbon/Hydrogen/Nitrogen Elemental (CHN) Analyzer for the National Laboratory for Environmental Testing – Saskatoon (NLET-S).

Note: Kindly ensure that all employees are aware of this tender announcement. The tender is now closed. We are not accepting any new tender at this time.

(The main contractor decided to proceed with the in-house CHN analysis. He will ultimately perform it by manually and selling it to vendors )
